import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CartService } from 'src/app/service/cart.service'; import { Cart } from 'src/app/sheard/models/cart'; import { CartItem } from 'src/app/sheard/models/cartitem'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart-page', templateUrl: './cart-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart-page.component.css'] }) export class CartPageComponent { cart!:Cart constructor(private cartService:CartService){ this.cartService.getCartObservable().subscribe((item)=>{ this.cart = item }) } removeFromCart(cartItem:CartItem){ this.cartService.removeFromCart(cartItem.food.id) } changeQuantity(cartItem:CartItem, quantityInString:string){ const quantity = parseInt(quantityInString) this.cartService.changeQuantity(cartItem.food.id, quantity) } }
